title: What's going on with Watson, Coach Hires and Buffalo Bills Icon Steve Tasker Joins the Show
itunes:title: What's going on with Watson, Coach Hires and Buffalo Bills Icon Steve Tasker Joins the Show
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal fill you in on all of the latest news happening in the NFL starting with the NFL scouting combine cancelation (6:40) and star Texans QB Deshaun Watson being unhappy with the organization and potentially asking for a trade (9:45). We hop on the coaching carousel to discuss the new hirings with the Chargers (18:30) and the Atlanta Falcons (22:30). Buffalo Bills icon Steve Tasker joins the show to talk about the Bills chances against the Chiefs and what the team needs to do moving forward (45:09).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
